LanguageData.MakeStoneBlocks_Electric.label: 制作石砖（任意）
LanguageData.MakeStoneBlocks_Electric.description: Cuts a stone chunk into usable stone blocks. Produces 20 sand and 5 rubble as a by-product.
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterCorpse.label: 从人类尸体中提取生物质
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterCorpse.description: Extracts BioMatter from a corpse. Produces 35.
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterCorpse.jobString: 从人类尸体中提取生物质
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterAnimal.label: 从动物尸体中提取生物质
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterAnimal.description: Extracts BioMatter from an animal corpse. Produces 10.
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterAnimal.jobString: 从动物尸体中提取生物质
LanguageData.makesoylentgreen.label: 获取绿色营养物质
LanguageData.makesoylentgreen.description: Obtain Soylent Green from a humanlike corpse. Produces 45.
